item.description:

item.title: Lamp post has just been knocked down by a lorry, 3rd September
item.description:
A lorry has just reversed into the lamppost which has resulted in dangerous angle of lamppost and tarmac lifted...this is close to a primary school and lots of parents and children walk past

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castlecombe Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: Builders rubble left on footway, 3rd September
item.description:

item.title: Bikes blocking pavement and Charging bays, 3rd September
item.description:
Bicycles approx 30+ left on pavement and electric charging bay, blocking access and creating potential safety risk for pedestrians. Persistent issue, when will Hackney council take action to ensure pavements and electric bays remain clear and accessible??
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cazenove Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oil Spillage All Over Street, 3rd September
item.description:
Oil Spillage All Over Street from Gerard and down Wardour Street. Pedestrians slipping and bikes falling over. No signs. Extremely dangerous. Unsure how long but present at 9.30am.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Gerrard Street, Chinatown, London
